casebody.data:
Robert Joe LONG, petitioner,
v.
Mark S. INCH, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections. No. 18-9356 (18A1200). Supreme Court of the United States May 23, 2019.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari *2635to the Supreme Court of Florida denied.
